data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Prena, Jens, Zhang, Runzhi (2014): A taxonomic revision of Parallelodemas Faust from South China (Coleoptera, Curculionidae, Baridinae), with notes on sexually dimorphic characters. Deutsche Entomologische Zeitschrift 61 (2): 105-119, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.61.8142, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.61.8142
